resources.string: Find the right answer for the division.

Drag these numbers into Descending order.

Pop the balloons which have even numbers in 30 seconds!

Draw the symmetry of the shape shown on the left side to the right side, according to the axis of symmetry.
Please click Finish Test to exit!
